item.title: LENZ Therapeutics' Eye Drop Scores First FDA Approval For Age-Related Blurred Vision Condition Impacting 128 Million People
item.description: LENZ Therapeutics' VIZZ earns FDA approval as the first aceclidine-based eye drop to treat presbyopia, with U.S. launch expected in Q4 2025. read more
